name: RedactConversationPartOrMessage
description:
Redact specific parts or messages within a conversation.

Use this tool to redact a specific part of a conversation or the original message source. Ensure the targeted part has a body if a conversation part is being redacted. For source messages, they must originate from a contact. If criteria are not met, an error will be returned.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Accepts versions 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: redaction_details
parameters.description: Provide a JSON object with details of the conversation part or message to be redacted. It should include the necessary identifiers and attributes such as the body of the conversation part or source message. Ensure the criteria for redaction are met: a body for conversation parts and origination from a contact for source messages.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
